Task: suggest games based on a specific genre.

Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert  gamer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to suggest games based on a specific genre.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Suggest games using the questions and answers above. Also explain why games are suggested.
